snippet.title: Close to the Sun - Official Single by Porcelain Pill
snippet.description:
Close to the Sun is out now on Epic Games Store!

Purchase Now: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/close-to-the-sun/home 

I feel it in the air
There's something coming
The consequences
Are building

I don't want to be
A sinking ember
They'll all remember
As a warning

What have you done?

What's in the darkest water?
I'm scared to death that
I won't make it out of here alive.

Did somebody say
I feel we're sinking deeper with more
Speed the more we strive.

Is that what we get for playing
too close to the sun?

I feel a little scared
A storm is coming
The thunder's breaking
Upon us

Now I don't understand
But I fear the danger
The static and the sparks
Can hold

What have you done?

What's in the darkest water?
I'm scared to death that
I won't make it out of here alive.

Did somebody say
I feel we're sinking deeper with more
Speed the more we strive.

Is that what we get for playing
too close to the sun?

We’ve been playing with fire
Now it's all set ablaze
Oh what have we done?
Is that what we get for playing
Too close to the sun?

About the Song:

Composed by Porcelain Pill founder Adam Scott-McGuinness, Close to the Sun was created for the atmospheric horror game, exploring its dark themes and warnings through stunning vocals and mesmerising instrumentals.  

About Porcelain Pill:

Porcelain Pill is the folktronica project of Adam Scott-McGuinness, a musician/producer and multi-instrumentalist based in Tasmania, Australia. Starting as a duo with Madeleine Becker in late 2012 the group released two EP’s and played a plethora of live shows across Australia showcasing a unique combination of synthesisers, drum machines, looping technology, cello, guitars and ukulele.

Visit http://www.porcelainpill.com, follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/porcelainpill, Facebook http://www.facebook.com/porcelainpill or Instagram http://instagram.com/porcelainpill
